actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to strengthen the penalty provisions of the Gun Control Act of 1968.

summary.text: Increases the penalty for use of a firearm during the Commission of specified crimes from a minimum of one year for a first offense to a minimum of ten years and from a minimum of two years for a second offense to a minimum twenty-five year term of imprisonment. Allows State courts with jurisdiction in such cases to enforce the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to strengthen the penalty provisions of the Gun Control Act of 1968.
